name: Hundred Points
baseMeaning: The number 100, underlined twice for emphasis.
tldr: Means 'perfect', 'keeping it real', or 100% agreement. Ultimate validation.

contextMeanings.meaning: Something is perfect, authentic, or completely true.
Being genuine or keeping it real.
May seem too casual for formal professional contexts.

platformNotes.note: Used to cosign statements or express total agreement.
Common in comments showing full support or validation.
Used to confirm something is true or validate a take.

generationalNotes.note: Standard for validation, authenticity, or perfect agreement.
Same usage - expressing full agreement or authenticity.
May take more literally as a number or score.
